typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		description as string,
		name as string,
		sysId as string,
		type as string,
		version as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> TaskDefinitions
source(output(
		type as string,
		actions as (abortActions as string[], emailNotifications as string[], setVariableActions as string[], snmpNotifications as string[], systemOperations as string[]),
		cpDuration as string,
		cpDurationUnit as string,
		customField1 as (label as string, value as string),
		customField2 as (label as string, value as string),
		efDayConstraint as string,
		efDuration as string,
		efEnabled as boolean,
		efNthAmount as string,
		efTime as string,
		efType as string,
		exclusiveTasks as string[],
		executionRestriction as string,
		holdResources as boolean,
		lfDayConstraint as string,
		lfDuration as string,
		lfEnabled as boolean,
		lfNthAmount as string,
		lfTime as string,
		lfType as string,
		lsDayConstraint as string,
		lsDuration as string,
		lsEnabled as boolean,
		lsNthAmount as string,
		lsTime as string,
		lsType as string,
		name as string,
		notes as string[],
		opswiseGroups as string[],
		resPriority as string,
		resolveNameImmediately as boolean,
		restrictionPeriod as string,
		restrictionPeriodAfterDate as string,
		restrictionPeriodAfterTime as string,
		restrictionPeriodBeforeDate as string,
		restrictionPeriodBeforeTime as string,
		restrictionPeriodDateList as string[],
		retainSysIds as boolean,
		sleepAmount as string,
		sleepDayConstraint as string,
		sleepDuration as string,
		sleepTime as string,
		sleepType as string,
		startHeld as boolean,
		startHeldReason as string,
		summary as string,
		sysId as string,
		timeZonePref as string,
		userEstimatedDuration as string,
		variables as string[],
		version as string,
		virtualResources as string[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> TaskProperties
TaskDefinitions, TaskProperties union(byName: true)~> Union1
